channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Household waste outside 51 Maury, 15th November
item.description:
Household waste regularly dumped outside 51 Maury garage, this time a chair, a large box, and miscellaneous rubbish.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of household waste on Maury Rd, 15th November
item.description:
One of the boxes has the name Cagla Ozdemir as per photo. This spot regularly gets flytipping and needs to be monitored by the council and fines issued to make it stop.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wheelie bins, 15th November
item.description:
These wheelie bins needs to be taken away as they do not belong to anyone, but get used and over filled. Regular dust bin men do not take them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dandridge Close, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two vans occupying parking space , forever, 15th November
item.description:
The original van has been stationary in that parking space for almost two years, and a second van has recently been parked alongside it. Consequently, the space is consistently occupied, leaving no available parking for clients during peak times.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Elliott Road, Widmore, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing 4 wheel blue plastic industrial dumpster bin on footway in Green Lane, Penge, 8m from the junction with High St., 15th November
item.description:
Overflowing 4 wheel blue plastic industrial dumpster bin on footway in Green Lane, Penge, 8m from the junction with High St. This appears to be the same bin, just relocated, that used to be on the High St frontage containing waste consistent with Greengrocer's waste such as at 173 High St. Current 14/11/25 and former photo attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 175, High Street, Penge, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
